The bills introduced today by Representatives Joe Pitts ( R-PA), Chris Smith( R-NJ) and Daniel Lipinski ( D-IL) would get the job done. The 112th Congress understands the urgency of addressing the tragedy of nearly 4,000 abortions per day, over 52 million total since Roe v. Wade. Now is the time to pass laws that save lives and end taxpayer funding of abortion, she said.
